content: **knitted dress for babies and children in drops alpaca the piece is worked top down with round yoke lace pattern and flounce on the yoke sizes 0 6 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the sweet primrose bonnet pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-108-by yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 - 5/6 years child s height in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 - 110/116 **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-150-200 200-250-300 g colour 9026 blush drops buttons no 600 3 items in all sizes for the split mid-back needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/43-16-sweet-primrose-bonnet
